data.actual_result: The text between `**` is displayed non-bold
data.expected_result: The markdown should be escaped/ignored as it's not supported in Playing status
data.short_description: Markdown bold syntax (`**text**`) is parsed in Playing Status text
data.steps_to_repro: - You need two accounts : one logged in on Desktop, another one on an Android device - On Desktop, change the Playing status to something that contains text between `**` (only works with bold Markdown syntax, doesnt work with `~~text~~` or `__text__` for example)  - On your Android device, observe the Playing status of your other account
